description: This file defines the interface class 'DobbyInterface' for managing container operations via DobbyProxy, including container lifecycle management, command execution, and event handling.

classes.name: DobbyInterface
classes.description: Manages container lifecycle and interactions through DobbyProxy, with event callbacks and IPC.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the Dobby interface with the provided event handler.

methods.name: terminate
methods.description: Cleans up resources and shuts down the Dobby interface.

methods.name: listContainers
methods.description: Retrieves the list of containers.

methods.name: getContainerInfo
methods.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific container.

methods.name: getContainerState
methods.description: Gets the current state of a container.

methods.name: startContainer
methods.description: Starts a container with specified parameters.

methods.name: startContainerFromDobbySpec
methods.description: Starts a container using a Dobby specification.

methods.name: stopContainer
methods.description: Stops a container, optionally forcefully.

methods.name: pauseContainer
methods.description: Pauses a running container.

methods.name: resumeContainer
methods.description: Resumes a paused container.

methods.name: hibernateContainer
methods.description: Hibernates a container with options.

methods.name: wakeupContainer
methods.description: Wakes up a hibernated container.

methods.name: executeCommand
methods.description: Executes a command inside a container.

methods.name: annotate
methods.description: Adds an annotation key-value pair to a container.

methods.name: removeAnnotation
methods.description: Removes an annotation from a container.

methods.name: mount
methods.description: Mounts a filesystem source to a target inside a container.

methods.name: unmount
methods.description: Unmounts a resource from the container.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container has started.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container has stopped.

methods.name: onContainerStateChanged
methods.description: Callback for container state changes.

methods.name: onVerityFailed
methods.description: Callback for verity failure events.

ctags.name: mEventListenerId
ctags.pattern: /^            int mEventListenerId; \/\/ Dobby event listener ID$/
